name: TrueNorth
headline: TrueNorth gives truckers a single place to manage their business.
description:
Traditional trucking companies still run on paper, emails, phone calls, and snail mail. They‚Äôre inefficient and bloated. The pressure of low margins suffocates the truckers who actually do the work.

Our software cuts out the inefficiencies, and we pass the savings through to our truckers. Instead of paper-pushers and endless phone calls, they get an end-to-end solution: customer management, load coordination, automated invoicing, and instant payments. A single place to manage their business.

A blog post that goes deeper into why we started this company: https://medium.com/@jinstedge/truenorth-b42437f1dc03

We're a team of over 60, and proud to say the *majority* of us are female or non-binary. We come from a wide range of backgrounds. We don't just value diversity, we cherish it. And we mean it.
markdown:

# One app to rule them all
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/66b57638a4893d4e00f52eb1_Frame%207.svg)
# 1. **Search our**[**FREE loadboard**](http://www.truenorthfleet.com/</free-loadboard>)
Over 100,000 daily loads from hundreds of brokers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/66b58a2c454689dea5430c0d_loadie.svg)
# **2. Loadie, your virtual dispatcher, gets to work**
Loadie works with brokers to send you exclusive loads _before_ they get posted to any loadboard
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/66b57690c72afba1c3b96ebe_Frame%209.svg)
# **3. Build relationships with brokers**
Go beyond the spot market and score dedicated and holiday freight.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/66b576990cf82dc2bc7cdae7_Frame%2010.svg)
# **4. Put your back office on autopilot**
Send RateCons, PODs, and Invoices to brokers or your factoring partner
## Trucking companies love it
> One of the standout features of Loadie is its ability to recommend loads that are not openly available to everyone. It's like having a trusted matchmaker setting up your first date. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/67450bd3c25fad26d3582ab4_Boblett%20Image.png)
Chad Boblett _Rate Per Mile Masters_
> Because of TrueNorth, I am making more money than I ever have. It is an amazing App that makes it easy to book my own loads. I don‚Äôt have to use a dispatching service anymore because of the new AI features that TrueNorth has launched. It is a really amazing loadboard and App!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/66c3d4e836be134f8819681a_TrueNorth%20Favicon%20\(Large\).png)
Aracely O.TrueNorth User

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/676344921cc53042b3b18e77_Star-image-thick-full.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/676344921cc53042b3b18e77_Star-image-thick-full.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/676344921cc53042b3b18e77_Star-image-thick-full.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/676344921cc53042b3b18e77_Star-image-thick-full.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aa40f27054284ced985b47/676344921cc53042b3b18e77_Star-image-thick-full.png)

Wonderful app to work with. Personnel extremely helpful and knowledgeable. Luis Ducco was extremely attentive and very pleasant to work with.

generated_description:
### TrueNorth: Streamlining Trucking for the Modern Era

**Mission**: TrueNorth is on a straightforward mission: to provide truckers with a unified platform to manage their business efficiently. 

Founded in 2019, TrueNorth emerged from an industry still shackled by outdated practices‚Äîthink paper forms, emails, phone calls, and the dreaded snail mail. In a sector plagued by low margins and inefficiencies, TrueNorth aims to cut through the chaos. Their software not only simplifies these day-to-day challenges but also shares the resultant savings with their users. 

The platform delivers an end-to-end solution that includes customer management, load coordination, automated invoicing, and instant payments‚Äîessentially, it's a single dashboard for truckers to run their operations smoothly.

### A Diverse Team with a Purpose

With a team of over 60, TrueNorth prides itself on its commitment to diversity, with the majority of its staff being female or non-binary. This inclusivity is not just a checkbox; it's a core value that informs their approach to business. 

The company is nestled in the heart of San Francisco and was part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, which is noteworthy in the startup ecosystem.

### Key Features of TrueNorth

TrueNorth offers a plethora of services that make life easier for truckers:

1. **Free Loadboard**: Access to over 100,000 daily loads from various brokers.
2. **Virtual Dispatcher**: Their AI assistant, Loadie, proactively communicates with brokers for exclusive loads, ensuring users have first dibs before these opportunities hit market boards.
3. **Simplified Back Office**: Automates the sending of essential documents like RateCons and PODs, streamlining broker interactions.
4. **Market Intelligence**: Provides deep insights into profitability ratings for each load, empowering truckers to make informed decisions.

Their innovative dispatching features help build crucial relationships with brokers, pushing truckers towards dedicated contracts instead of low-margin spots.

### Recognition and Resources

Most recently, TrueNorth was recognized in FreightWaves' FreightTech 100, a testament to their impact on the logistics landscape. 

For those interested in learning more, their blog offers insights into various topics, from trucking compliance to strategies for new carriers. 

In short, TrueNorth is not just another tech startup; it's a necessary evolution for an industry ready to break free from inefficiencies. They want to make trucking smarter‚Äîafter all, when truckers succeed, the whole supply chain benefits. 

Check out their website at [TrueNorth Fleet](http://www.truenorthfleet.com) to explore their solutions and join the movement toward a more efficient trucking industry.
